Question: The act of _________ should be prohibited under any circumstances. Everyone all has equal rights to vote. (FRANCHISE)

Pending the _________ of KFC, the manager had to catch up on a huge number of backlogs. (TAKE)

Like many other __________ of my age, I dread to use hi-tech gears. (TECHNICAL)

________ of violence has been possible by means of television. (DOCTRINE)
